---
title: "Organizers"
---

This will be the 12th edition of SBDM. In 2025, the conference is mainly organized by researchers from 
three main neuroscience institutes of Lyon ([SBRI](https://sbri.fr/),
[ISC-MJ](http://www.isc.cnrs.fr/),
[CRNL](https://www.crnl.fr/en?language=en)) and a economics lab ([GATE](https://www.gate.cnrs.fr/en/)).
